11323212221121.content:
Emily was giggling with delight as you took a small swallow of the laxative-based baby formula that she had filled it with. Despite it tasting a bit off, you had no clue whatsoever that the contents laying inside of the plastic bottle with a rubber nipple were based entirely on laxatives. More specifically, fast-acting ones, some stool softeners, a few new kinds of laxatives in stores being called, "Mess Enhancers", and the old fashioned kind that took their sweet little time. All of this mixed very, very thoroughly only increased the effect of each laxative. After you finished the plastic toy bottle, Emily was tickled pink and found a little bit of strength to cut the laughing off and leave you there with a plastic bottle in your hands.
When she returned, you noticed she had brought back with her an actual baby bottle that seemed mountainous to you, still filled with that formula you just finished before. Only this one was a much bigger dose, and your size matching that of a little Barbie dolls, the effects would be ultimately maximized to their fullest extent on your insides and precious little diapered bottom. You were curious as how your current captor expected you to drink, since the nipple was much too big to fit inside your mouth. To fix that problem, you saw Emily was holding a funnel with the bottom part being as thin as the plastic one's nipple had been, and the top part fit snugly onto the full-sized baby bottle as long as the rubber end on it was taken off. She got things prepared for your unholy messing, totally unknown to you still, and ended up having the plastic bottle's nipple hooked firm onto the slim end of the funnel, with the real baby bottle attached just as tightly. Emily looked at you and laughed almost maniacally, most of the maniac part due to the fact that she was imagining you with a mess so big you wouldn't be able to move without her help.

Emily looked down at you with an innocent, yet deceiving look on her face, as if she was hiding some evil little secret she was about to do to you. Pointing at your mouth, then at hers with it open, you opened your mouth and waited for your unknown fate. You had many thoughts rushing through your head as she plopped the bottle-funnel contraption into your mouth and you began to drink. What does she plan on doing to me with this? Is she expecting me to go in the outfit I'm in? Why's the formula taste so much different than it did in the plastic bottle? These were only a few out of many thoughts you had while you continued to drink, and drink, and drink, and DRINK.

After a good 5 or 6 minutes, the torturous drinking had finally ended. You finally finished the whole bottle, and feeling very full at accomplishing that. Emily made sure you drank it all and grabbed you firmly into her hands. At this, you began to hiccup uncontrollably, as a baby might do after finishing a bottle of warm milk. Emily started to thump your back as lightly as she could, not really knowing you couldn't be hurt. Which you supposed was a good thing, because if she found out she'd probably spend a whole week finding different ways to torture you. At the fourth thump, you finally gave out a small little burp that seemed so cute to Emily she deemed it cute enough to giggle at. Suddenly Emily had a look of concern on her face. You couldn't figure out why, as babies usually don't have anything to be concerned about, since their parents or, in this case, you, take care of them. She laid you down and took off the blue footed sleeper you were placed into moments ago, and went in search of something. This 'something' happened to be a school girl's outfit, but instead of having a matching pair of panties, it had a much larger, much more cuter diaper that matched the rest of the outfit even better than the panties did. Emily is a bit of a doll outfit collector, but even her mother doesn't know that. Usually, whenever she sees a doll she likes, she would point at it and jump up and down in a seemingly joyful act and her mother would plop it into the buggy, when really it was the outfit she was after.

Returning after what felt like hours, she came back and showed you the outfit she had picked out. She also took the current diaper off of you and replaced it with the cuter, matching one. Emily stood you up and you both heard a loud gurgle, followed by the loudest, ripest, wettest fart ever known to man. You blushed, not knowing what had suddenly given you a very un-ladylike gas. This thought was followed by horrible cramps, along with a few more loud and wet farts. You fell to your knees and started to rock back and forth, worried about what had suddenly given you cramps and a seemingly endless supply of smelly farts. After a good minute of rocking, Emily plopped a binky-gag into your mouth and tied the little strings in a knot behind your head, just so you couldn't reach it. At this, she giggled as you let out the longest, stinkiest, wettest fart you had ever done before. But this fart wasn't a fart. No, you realized, this was something much worse. You were pooping in the diaper, and uncontrollably at that! An unconscious instinct kicked in and you stopped rocking, now crouching and your body pushing the massive load into the cute little diaper.

A good twenty minutes passed before the messing finally came to an end. Or so you thought..
